# contextforge Provider

Terraform provider for managing IBM MCP ContextForge resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "contextforge" {
  endpoint = "https://your-mcp-gateway.example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) ContextForge MCP Gateway endpoint URL
